doc.summary: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> for mods using <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref>.
doc.text: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> for mods using <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref>. This will automatically set the  creative tab if it's defined in the mod.
